sources.title: Girl in Room 20 (1946) SPENCER WILLIAMS
sources.description:
BLACK HISTORY MONTH
Director: Spencer Williams
Stars: Geraldine Brock, Spencer Williams, R. Jore 

When a small town girl comes to the big city to pursue a singing career, she is befriended by paternal cab drivers and down-and-out show troupers, but preyed upon by an adulterous pimp.

metadata.Plot: A rural girl comes to the big city to pursue a singing career, and is befriended by paternal cab drivers and down-and-out show troupers, and preyed upon by an adulterous pimp.
metadata.Actors: Geraldine Brock, Spencer Williams, R. Jore
